Pre-Game Insights: The series is expected to witness viewership between 180-220 million.
The India-Sri Lanka bilateral series will be played from July 27 to August 7, 2024.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series, which will be played from July 27 to August 7, 2024, kicks off with three T20Is followed by the same amount of ODIs.
Others: The Indian T20I team witnesses a new captain, Suryakumar Yadav, and youngsters who aim to cement their spots as Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli have hung their boots.
The ODI series sees the return of the experienced contenders and commences the ICC Menâ€™s Champions Trophy 2025 journey.
The upcoming series also inaugurates the coaching stint of the former Indian cricketer, Gautam Gambhir.
